Description: Require that an entity be set. If option is not set then blank values are allowed. Devault is to require values.
Allow duplicate values to be set when element is not in a container and is repeating. Default is to not allow duplicate values.
Show an error message when value is duplicate and allow duplicate values is not set. Default is to not show an error message and discard the duplicate value silently.
Width, in characters or pixels, of the field when displayed in a user interface. Pixel values must be followed by the suffix "px"
Values: Integers greater then zero, with or without a "px" suffix. Ex. "10", "100px"

Description: Disable locale specification for values. By default values will not take locale specifications. If set to 0 a locale selector will be displayed alongside each value in a user interface.
Restrict entry to a single value per-locale. By default any number of values may be set for a locale. If set only one values per locale may be defined.
Allow values to be used for sorting of search results. By default values are available for sorts.
Allow values to be used in search forms. By default values are available for use in search forms.
Allow values to be included in displays. By default values are available for inclusion in displays.
Allow PDF to be generated for values. By default PDFs are not generated. If set options to generate PDFs for the values will be present in a user interface.
Allow PDF to be generated for individual values. By default PDFs are not generated. If set options to generate PDFs for individual values will be present in a user interface.

Layout for values when used in a display. Element code tags prefixed with the ^ character, used to represent the value in the template. For example: ^ca_entities.lifesdates. If omitted the system default template will be used.
Delimiter to use between multiple values.
Restricts display to items of the specified type(s). Omit for no restriction.
Values: Entity type code; repeat for multiple types.
